item.description:
http://www.bostonautoshows.com/world-of-wheels.htm

 

This is an auto/ motorcycle show that Annie and June have entered their bikes into. Annie will be showing off her newly painted bike!  In addition, there will be room for us to have a table and banner for our club with cards and flyers.  We are looking for some individuals who want to go to the show on either day and be willing to man the table to represent and talk about our club to anyone who might want to inquire. It can be for whatever amount of time you can be there.......... Please wear Thunder shirts and vests.  Depending on volunteers, a meeting location can be determined at a later date. Admission

  • Friday, March 22: 3 pm – 10:00 pm
  • Saturday, March 23: 10 am – 10:00 pm
  • Sunday, March 24: 10 am – 7 pm

  • Gate:     General Admission – $18.00 
  •  

  •   

     

     

     

     

     

    Discounts:

  • At http://townfair.com/rebates.shtml
  • $2.00 off discount coupons, good for adult, one per customer can be picked up at any Townfair store location:
  • Quincy-Hanover-Braintree-Brockton-Plymouth-South Attleboro-Raynham-Walpole-Seekonk

Location

Seaport World Trade Center
(formerly Commonwealth Pier)
200 Seaport Boulevard
Boston, MA 02210

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: WORLD OF WHEELS
